Review: Nice car to maintain, Petrol car, low on maintenance but high on performance. Spare parts are also quite affordable, comfortable and and great on build quality

Service of Mahindra in Petrol cars is not satisfactory and they couldn't maintained spares. Although car itself is best in class.
